channel.title: Shadewater - sky [Lo-Fi, A5]
channel.description:
So now with Auxy 5 we can do a ton of automation and tweaking with instruments, especially drums. That allows for some really cool atmospheric or filtered sounds! I was inspired by aUstin Haga - Broken Glass and other songs I’ve heard over the years. Here is my official attempt at a lo-fi track with Auxy 5!
https://soundcloud.com/shadewater/s-k-y

item.title: Shadewater - sky [Lo-Fi, A5]
item.dc:creator: Shadewater
item.description:
Thanks bro! Can’t wait to hear your experiments.

Read full topic

item.title: Shadewater - sky [Lo-Fi, A5]
item.dc:creator: therealejoc
item.description:
Very nice. Atmospheric vibe is very full, which I like. I like what you’ve done with the new drum options . Honestly can wait to put out some stuff using them.

Read full topic
